lead_paragraph: At a news conference, the president said Donald J. Trump’s claims showed that the Republican Party’s nominee lacked the leadership or toughness to be president.

byline.contributor: Mark Landler reported from Washington, and Ashley Parker from Colorado Springs. Jennifer Steinhauer contributed reporting from Washington.
byline.original: By MARK LANDLER and ASHLEY PARKER

headline.print_headline: Stop ‘Whining’ and Trying to Discredit the Election, Obama Tells Trump
headline.main: Obama Tells Trump: Stop ‘Whining’ and Trying to Discredit the Election

snippet: At a news conference, the president said Donald J. Trump’s claims showed that the Republican Party’s nominee lacked the leadership or toughness to be president....
abstract: Pres Obama, Rose Garden press conference, tells Donald J Trump to stop 'whining' and trying to discredit election before even one vote has been cast; comments come as Trump campaigns in Colorado Springs,, where he repeats his claims that election will be rigged.
